Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Bulls take on the Utah Jazz in non-conference play.
Chicago went 39-43 overall a season ago while going 20-21 at home.
Utah finished 31-51 overall last season while going 10-31 on the road.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Utah Jazz (0-5, 15th in the Western Conference) vs. Chicago Bulls (3-3, fifth in the Eastern Conference)
Jazz: Lauri Markkanen: out (back), Taylor Hendricks: out for season (fibula), Jordan Clarkson: out (heel), Isaiah Collier: out (hamstring)
